ISSUE.TITLE: [bank accounts & invoicing modules] Missing Intermediary BIC / BIC interm√©diaire
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug Hi, Intermediary BIC field is missing in the bank accounts & invoicing modules. It should be added as default. ### Environment Version 18.0.2 ### Environment OS ArchLinux ### Environment Web server Nginx 1.25.2 ### Environment PHP 8.2.11 ### Environment Database mariadb from 11.1.2-MariaDB, client 15.2 for Linux (x86_64) using readline 5.1 ### Environment URL(s) _No response_ ### Expected and actual behavior Intermediary BIC field should be present in the bank accounts & invoicing modules after the BIC field. It is not the case and they should be added as default. ### Steps to reproduce the behavior Go into the bank accounts or the invoicing module. Issue an invoice or look at your bank details. Intermediary BIC is missing. ### Attached files _No response_

COMMIT.MESSAGE: NEW #26312 Manage intermediate BIC - SQL Part
